basicInfo.name: Joker
basicInfo.flavor: Joker acquired his ability to control phantoms by paying a handsome fee to Velika during an experiment on black magic. He is able to visualize and give shape to his phantoms.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 60% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Full House
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 28% of Magic Attack 7 time(s).
 - 85% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 34% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Stun chance becomes 100%.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Increases Turns: Inflicts Stun duration becomes 4 turn(s).

Skill 2.name: Magic Hat
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies (By Highest No. of Buffs)
 - Deals damage equal to 40% of Magic Attack 3 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict 2 Buff Removal(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 48% of Magic Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 23% Crit Rate Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Lucky Coin
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Crit Damage Boost. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Crit Damage Boost to 25%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Magic, cards, hats, travel, fun, Ruri, May, happy lies
profile.story: Joker acquired his ability to control phantoms by paying a handsome fee to Velika during an experiment on black magic. He is able to visualize and give shape to his phantoms.

basicInfo.name: Joker
basicInfo.flavor: Joker utilizes his illusion magic to swindle people in gambling dens. He is wanted by the darker circles of the gambling world, but he uses his illusions to get away every time.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 45% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 45% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Full House
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 25% of Magic Attack 7 time(s).
 - 85% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 25% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Magic Hat
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies (By Highest No. of Buffs)
 - Deals damage equal to 36% of Magic Attack 3 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict 1 Buff Removal(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 36% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Lucky Coin
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Crit Damage Boost. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Crit Damage Boost to 16%.

basicInfo.name: Joker
basicInfo.flavor: No one knows where Joker came from. He travels around the world performing magic shows, sometimes even at royal parties.
